name: ミンク
message: "...Yeah, that's right."
...I open my eyes to the sound of Mink's voice.
I must have dozed off at some point.

name: ミンク
message: "Yeah. I've got someone I want to turn over."
Mink is talking to someone. A phone call?
"I've got someone I want to turn over."
Who?
...No way.
Instantly, I'm fully awake. I sit Ren softly down on the floor and use the wall to pull myself up.
Mink is on the couch, fiddling with his Coil, his conversation apparently over.
I walked over and put my hands on the back of the couch. Mink turns to look at me.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...What was that about?"
Mink raises an eyebrow, but only a fraction.

name: 蒼葉
message: "You said you had someone you wanted to 'turn over.'"

name: ミンク
message: "...You don't need to know."
That again? I don't know how many times I've heard him say that now.
Letting my fears drive me, I continue.

name: 蒼葉
message: "That wasn't about me, was it?"
Mink says nothing.
I'm used to him not answering my questions, but this just makes me panic.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Answer me."

name: ミンク
message: "Shut your mouth."
Mink suddenly gets to his feet.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Hey!"

name: ミンク
message: "We're waiting on word from my men today. Don't go outside."
With that, Mink vanishes upstairs.
The sound of his door slamming echoes through the house.
I look up at the second floor, left to stew in my growing anxiety.
...Was that call about me or not?
Feeling restless, I sit down on the edge of the couch and put my face in my hands.
I hope shutting out the world will help to calm my mind.
Assuming that call was about me, who does Mink plan to turn me over to?

The cops?
...Toue?
No. He wouldn't do that.
But can I really say that with confidence? I don't know a thing about Mink.
It's not like he's told me anything. This could all be some elaborate ruse.
I have no basis to trust Mink. If anything, the evidence tells me to do the opposite.
When it comes to his goal, Mink doesn't hesitate. He isn't picky about his methods either.
I have the power to control people, which makes me the perfect chip to bargain with Toue.
...It's too dangerous. I can't trust him. I have Ren to worry about too.
...I need to get away.
I pull my hands away from my face and steel my resolve.
